div.div: Delaware Valley Coll vs. Wash. & Jeff.

tr.td: DVC wins toss; defers. W&J will receive. DVC to kick left to right.
Brandon Snyder kickoff 49 yards to the W&J21, Max Creighan return 8 yards to the W&J29 (Mike Jaskowski;John Robinson).
Matt Bliss rush for 3 yards to the W&J32 (Chris James;Ken Fowlkes).
Matt Bliss rush for 12 yards to the W&J44, 1ST DOWN W&J (T. Osborne;Mike Jaskowski).
Matt Bliss pass incomplete to Alex Baroffio (Ken Fowlkes).
Matt Bliss pass complete to Alex Baroffio for 6 yards to the 50 yardline (John Eberly;Chris James).
Matt Bliss sacked for loss of 13 yards to the W&J37 (Mike Jaskowski).
Eric Eberle punt 31 yards to the DVC32, downed.
DELAWARE VALLEY COLL drive start at 12:49.
Kyle Schuberth rush for 2 yards to the DVC34 (Andy McGill).
Aaron Wilmer pass incomplete to Rodney Blango, dropped pass.
Aaron Wilmer pass complete to Isaiah Hall for 16 yards to the 50 yardline, 1ST DOWN DVC (Mitch Rose).
Tyler Neal rush for 4 yards to the W&J46 (Nathan Melhorn).
Aaron Wilmer rush for 21 yards to the W&J25, 1ST DOWN DVC (Neil Sorice).
Kyle Schuberth rush for 2 yards to the W&J23 (Neil Sorice).
Aaron Wilmer rush for 3 yards to the W&J20 (Frank Gigler).
Aaron Wilmer rush for 4 yards to the W&J16 (B.J. Monacelli;Jimmy Thompson), PENALTY DVC holding (Jason West) 10 yards to the W&J30, NO PLAY.
PENALTY DVC delay of game (Aaron Wilmer) 5 yards to the W&J35.
Aaron Wilmer pass complete to Isaiah Hall for 8 yards to the W&J27 (Frank Gigler).

Matt Bliss pass incomplete to Max Creighan, dropped pass.
Matt Bliss pass complete to Ben Hoffer for 4 yards to the W&J27.
Eric Eberle punt 43 yards to the DVC30, Pete O'Hara return 4 yards to the DVC34 (Mickey Bednar).
